data.title: Real Life 'Princess Bride:' Robin Wright Marries Her French Beau!
data.meta_description: Robin Wright married her boyfriend Clement Giraudet in a secret French ceremony!
data.text:
She’s officially the Princess Bride!

Robin Wright married her French boyfriend Clement Giraudet in a secret ceremony over the weekend.

The actress’ daughter, Dylan Wright Penn, shared a video of the party with the caption “Weddin vibes,” and tagged the location as La Roche-sur-le-Buis, a town in the French countryside.

Sean Penn’s ex-wife, and the mother of their two children, tied the knot “surrounded by their nearest and dearest,” Vogue Paris reported.

The House of Cards star, 52, wed the Saint Laurent fashion exec in a “bohemian lace wedding gown,” during her “ultra-secret ceremony,” according to the magazine.

Wright and Garaudet were both sporting rings on their wedding fingers in March, leading to speculation that they were already married.

Celebrity Couples Who Managed To Get Married In Secret

This is the third marriage for Wright, who was with Penn from 1996 to 2010.
